entities.description: The term 'Past Month Frequency' is interchangeable with the term '30-Day Frequency'.
The number of days (1-30) and imputation type regarding cigarette use in the past month.
Indicator for the type of imputation data (questionnaire, logically assigned, statistically imputed, etc.) for cigarette use frequency.
The number of days (1-30) and imputation type regarding cigar use in the past month.
Indicator for the type of imputation data (questionnaire, logically assigned, statistically imputed, etc.) for cigar use frequency.
The number of days (1-30) and imputation type regarding smokeless tobacco use in the past month.
Indicator for the type of imputation data (questionnaire, logically assigned, statistically imputed, etc.) for smokeless tobacco use frequency.
Indicator (code 91) for respondents who have never used cigarettes.
Indicator (code 93) for respondents who did not use cigarettes in the past month.
Indicator (code 91) for respondents who have never used cigars.
Indicator (code 93) for respondents who did not use cigars in the past month.
Indicator (code 91) for respondents who have never used smokeless tobacco.
Indicator (code 93) for respondents who did not use smokeless tobacco in the past month.

relationships.description: Indicates the type of imputation data for cigarette use frequency in the past month.
Indicates the type of imputation data for cigar use frequency in the past month.
Indicates the type of imputation data for smokeless tobacco use frequency in the past month.
Indicator for respondents who have never used cigarettes.
Indicator for respondents who did not use cigarettes in the past month.
Indicator for respondents who have never used cigars.
Indicator for respondents who did not use cigars in the past month.
Indicator for respondents who have never used smokeless tobacco.
Indicator for respondents who did not use smokeless tobacco in the past month.
